list-item.p: Resveratrol-derived stilbenoids have been screened as potential antiviral agents.
An overview of the studies on natural monomeric and oligomeric stilbenoids as antivirals is provided.
Evidences of antiviral activity of synthetic resveratrol analogues are also highlighted.
Several derivatives demonstrated to be more active than resveratrol itself in vitro.
The collected results highlight the potential development of stilbenoids as antiviral agents.
